Uses of Enum Class
com.ibm.streams.management.security.SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionScope

Packages that use SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionScope
Package
Description
com.ibm.streams.management.security
The com.ibm.streams.management.security package contains classes and interfaces for accessing and managing permissions to Streams secured objects for user, group, and role security principals.

  • Uses of SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionScope in com.ibm.streams.management.security
